name: node-mysql-boilerplate-with-authentication
description: NodeJS + MySQL API for Email Sign Up with Verification, Authentication & Forgot Password

scripts.db:migrate:fresh: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --migrations-path ./database/migrations && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./database/migrations
scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./database/migrations && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./database/seeders
